Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2015 08:58PM Mary_Lynn wrote: Using 10 mcg tablet twice a week for 2 years now, with proactive encouragement of BS and concurring support of both my MO and Primary MD. Only complaint is cost: $21 per tablet. BS feels possible/probable urinary tract and vaginal mucosa problems due to arimidex are greater threat than the minute amount of estrogen applied locally. Vagifem doesn't enter blood system.
Posts.Title: vagifem momand2kids bevin
